scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:css && npm run build:app
scripts.watch: concurrently -r -k "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:app" "npm run watch:css"
scripts.go: concurrently -k -n run,watch -c yellow,green "npm run start:watch" "npm run watch"
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm install- && npm run build
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run watch" "nodemon --watch dist node test/test.js"
